title: Four Secretaries re-appointed
body_lines: Four Secretaries have been re-appointed to the Ministries of Defence, Public Security, Finance and Public Administration from Tuesday to ensure the normalcy of the livelihood of the people, in accordance with the powers vested in President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

They are Ministry of Defence – Retired General Kamal Gunaratne, Ministry of Public Security – Retired Major General Jagath Alwis, Ministry of Finance – K.M. Mahinda Siriwardena and Public Administration – J.J. Rathnasiri.
